name: Blizzard (FallingFlatStudios)
description:
WELCOME!

Description: Welcome traveler and bare witness to the family of muffins. Watch as they try with every fiber of their being to out live the harsh winter months. There’s not enough food to last I hungry friend, and they know the inevitable will come for them.

Gameplay: Walk into the cold forest to attain juicy berries for your young. A docile face on any of the muffins means they are healthy and happy, a frowning face indicates hunger, and a crying face indicates starvation. You can be selfish and indulge in as many berries as you desire.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Eat - E
